name: Gma
tagline: A high-fidelity prototype of the genomic medicine assistant web application
body:
### The Genomic Medicine Assistant (GMA) is a high-fidelity prototype for delivering multi-gene sequencing panel reports to clinicians that simulates the user experience of a final application. 

### Authors and Contributors
Simon Guo (@nomismas), Priti Kumari (@priti88), Casey Overby (@overbyc)

### Citation
Cutting E, Banchero M, Beitelshees AL, Cimino JJ, Del Fiol G, Gurses AP, Hoffman MA, Jeng LJ, Kawamoto K, Kelemen M, Pincus HA, Shuldiner AR, Williams MS, Pollin TI, Overby CL. [User-centered design of multi-gene sequencing panel reports for clinicians] (http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1532046416300685). Journal of Biomedical Informatics. 2016 Jul 14.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
